Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: Effect: Aura of Preservation
Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura Of Preservation}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Critical Success).description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.name: Stance: Monastic Archer Stance
Stance: Monastic Archer Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.

Effect: Dueling Parry.name: Effect: Dueling Parry
Effect: Dueling Parry.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{Dueling Parry (Fighter)}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 circumstance bonus to AC

Effect: Smite Good.name: Effect: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 evil damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.name: Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb
Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 sonic damage, or an extra 1d6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Bristle.name: Effect: Bristle
Effect: Bristle.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Effect: Tiller's Drive
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Effect: Eye of the Arclords
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

Automatically applied effects:

  • you gain darkvision
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 cold damage, or an extra 1d6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.

Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Fearsome Rune.description: When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Effect: Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Stance: Point-Blank Shot.name: Stance: Point-Blank Shot
Stance: Point-Blank Shot.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point-Blank Shot}.

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Ceremony of Protection.name: Effect: Ceremony of Protection
Effect: Ceremony of Protection.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).name: Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)
Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

Effect: Smite Evil.name: Effect: Smite Evil
Effect: Smite Evil.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite Evil}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes with the weapon your blade ally inhabits against that foe deal an extra 4 good damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the foe attacks one of your allies, the duration extends to the end of that foe's next turn. If the foe continues to attack your allies each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Stance: Stumbling Stance.name: Stance: Stumbling Stance
Stance: Stumbling Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements. While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits. If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes flat-footed against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Effect: Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.name: Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance
Stance: Sky and Heaven Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

You enter a stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven, allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Effect: Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Stance: Cobra Stance.name: Stance: Cobra Stance
Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).name: Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success)
Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).description:
You are distracted and takes a -3 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Current Spell (Water).name: Effect: Current Spell (Water)
Effect: Current Spell (Water).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the water trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the water trait.

This effect has the water trait.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: Effect: Known Weakness
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Bespell Weapon.name: Effect: Bespell Weapon
Effect: Bespell Weapon.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a conjuration or transmution spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 damage.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Aura of Life.name: Effect: Aura of Life
Effect: Aura of Life.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YawVDUc9uzREIAnO]{Aura of Life}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to saves against necromancy effects.

Effect: Decry Thief (Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Success).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -5 foot status penalty to Speed and a -2 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Negative).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a necromancy spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 negative damage.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage, or an extra 1d6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast an abjuration spell or an evocation spell that didn't deal damage.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 force damage.

Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Keen Rune.description: The edges of a keen weapon are preternaturally sharp. Attacks with this weapon are a critical hit on a 19 on the die as long as that result is a success. This property has no effect on a 19 if the result would be a failure.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

Effect: Bon Mot.name: Effect: Bon Mot
Effect: Bon Mot.description:
You are distracted and takes a -2 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed).name: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed)
Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and already have a swimSpeed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your swim Speed.

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Grea.name: Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Greater)
Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune (Grea.description:
A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {2d6}[positive]]]{2d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead creature must attempt a DC 34 Fortitude save with the following effects. This is an incapacitation effect.

Critical Success It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Success It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn.

Failure It's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure It's destroyed.

Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.name: Stance: Rain of Embers Stance
Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed).name: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed)
Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and already have a climb Speed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your climb Speed.

Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: Effect: Avenge in Glory
Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Frequency once per day

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls

Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.name: Stance: Whirling Blade Stance
Stance: Whirling Blade Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IaiEZaA8erufMUCr]{Whirling Blade Stance}

You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

All melee Monk weapons you wield with the finesse trait gain the thrown 10 feet trait (unless they already have the thrown trait with a greater range).

Once you've made a thrown Strike with such a weapon, you can use the precision of your throw to make additional Strikes with it, even from a distance. Start from the space of the previous Strike's target to determine the range increment and whether the new target has cover. At the end of your turn, the thrown weapon flies directly back to you in a straight line. If a solid barrier blocks its path, it falls to the ground after hitting the barrier.

Effect: Divine Aegis.name: Effect: Divine Aegis
Effect: Divine Aegis.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xoIxiRtBVHV27Rvd]{Divine Aegis}

Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against non-divine magical effects, but you also take a -1 circumstance penalty to saves against divine effects.

Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Dread Marshal Stance
Effect: Dread Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.R7c4PyTNkZb0yvoT]{Dread Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a status bonus to damage rolls equal to the number of weapon damage dice of the unarmed attack or weapon you are wielding that has the most weapon damage dice. When you or an ally in the aura critically hits an enemy with a Strike, that enemy is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Educate Allies (Self).name: Effect: Educate Allies (Self)
Effect: Educate Allies (Self).description: Granted by using @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.

Stance: Dueling Dance.name: Stance: Dueling Dance
Stance: Dueling Dance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9VGmE7X4aK2W8YWj]{Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FYz5eQeTox9IDkSd]{Dueling Dance (Fighter)}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 circumstance bonus to AC

Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).name: Effect: Align Armament (Lawful)
Effect: Align Armament (Lawful).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body. Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and weapons you wield that have the monk trait deal additional electricity damage equal to one-half your level and additional sonic damage equal to one-half your level.

If you also know the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.oo7YcRC2gcez81PV]{Ki Blast} ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead). Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you also takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Effect: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YZ138OqflDhrkqmR]{Enforce Oath}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

Effect: Formation Training.name: Effect: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by Formation Training

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Stance: Mountain Stance (Mountain Strong.name: Stance: Mountain Stance (Mountain Stronghold)
Stance: Mountain Stance (Mountain Strong.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n2hawNmzW7DBn1Lm]{Mountain Stronghold}, which increases the Dexterity modifier cap to your AC to +1.

You enter the stance of an implacable mountain—a technique first discovered by dwarven monks—allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche. The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped.

However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +1, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.

Stance: Disarming Stance.name: Stance: Disarming Stance
Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{Disarming Stance}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm.

Effect: Aura of Despair.name: Effect: Aura of Despair
Effect: Aura of Despair.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wjnfdh6WzN7HbmeE]{Aura Of Despair}

Enemies within 15 of you take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Critical Failure).description: The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Effect: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you’ve manifested your wings.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs
Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed).name: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed)
Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and do not already have a swim Speed.

You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

Stance: Six Pillars Stance.name: Stance: Six Pillars Stance
Stance: Six Pillars Stance.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{Six Pillars Stance}

Requirements You are unarmored.

You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed. While in this stance, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by using actions with the concentrate or manipulate traits. In addition, when you cast a spell that requires one or more actions while in this stance, your unarmed Strikes gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage.

Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.name: Stance: Tangled Forest Stance
Stance: Tangled Forest Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2tUdsoPEnW9yS8so]{Tangled Forest Stance}

You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes' movements. You can make lashing branch unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you're in Tangled Forest Stance and can act, every enemy in your reach that tries to move away from you must succeed at a Reflex save, Acrobatics check, or Athletics check against your class DC or be immobilized for that action. If you prefer, you can allow the enemy to move.

Effect: Reflective Ripple Stance.name: Effect: Reflective Ripple Stance
Effect: Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.name: Stance: Shooting Stars Stance
Stance: Shooting Stars Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6cQSPqXoAO6oJl0i]{Shooting Stars Stance}

You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

While in this stance, you can use your monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with shuriken instead.

Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Ghost Touch Rune.description: The weapon can harm creatures without physical form. A ghost touch weapon is particularly effective against incorporeal creatures, which almost always have a specific vulnerability to ghost touch weapons. Incorporeal creatures can touch, hold, and wield ghost touch weapons (unlike most physical objects).

Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: Stance: Gorilla Stance
Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic (Weapon).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}.

When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract level. If they attempt to do so, the emblazoned symbol immediately disappears.

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Current Spell (Air).name: Effect: Current Spell (Air)
Effect: Current Spell (Air).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait.

This effect has the air trait.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: Effect: Spin Tale
Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a critical failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -4 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Aura of Faith.name: Effect: Aura of Faith
Effect: Aura of Faith.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7sFhBYoz5GSBFNbY]{Aura of Faith}

Each good-aligned ally within 15 feet deal an extra 1 good damage against evil creatures on their first Strike that hits an evil creature each round.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Effect: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Success)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Success).description: The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).name: Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic)
Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Effect: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Flaming Rune.description: This weapon is empowered by flickering flame. The weapon deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} on a successful Strike, plus [[/r 1d10 #persistent fire]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Fire Damage} on a critical hit.

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Weapon} if you cast a divination, enchantment or illusion spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 mental damage.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Axiomatic Rune.description:
Complex and symmetrical, an axiomatic rune imbues a weapon with lawful energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 lawful damage against chaotic targets. If you are chaotic, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at an attack roll with this weapon against a chaotic creature, instead of rolling, count each weapon damage die as average damage rounded up (3 for d4, 4 for d6, 5 for d8, 6 for d10, 7 for d12).

Craft Requirements You are lawful.

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status P.name: Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)
Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status P.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

Stance: Wolf Stance.name: Stance: Wolf Stance
Stance: Wolf Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AN9jY1JVcU20Qdw6]{Wolf Stance}

You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth. You can make wolf jaw unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If you're flanking a target while in Wolf Stance, your wolf jaw unarmed attacks also gain the trip trait.

Effect: Necrotic Infusion.name: Effect: Necrotic Infusion
Effect: Necrotic Infusion.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6erzXaxxvcXYnL9H]{Necrotic Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to restore Hit Points to a single undead creature, the target then deals an additional 1d6 negative damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the harm spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th level, the damage increases to 3d6.

Effect: Align Armament (Good).name: Effect: Align Armament (Good)
Effect: Align Armament (Good).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).name: Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)
Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.name: Effect: Accursed Clay Fist
Effect: Accursed Clay Fist.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.

Effect: Radiant Infusion.name: Effect: Radiant Infusion
Effect: Radiant Infusion.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Radiant Infusion}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} to restore Hit Points to a single living creature, the target deals an additional 1d6 positive damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th level, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th level.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 good damage.

Effect: Align Armament (Evil).name: Effect: Align Armament (Evil)
Effect: Align Armament (Evil).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Align Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 evil damage.

Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon
Effect: Deadly Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{Deadly Poison Weapon}.

Stance: Wild Winds Stance.name: Stance: Wild Winds Stance
Stance: Wild Winds Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{Wild Winds Stance}

You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.

You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Disrupting Rune.description: A disrupting weapon pulses with positive energy, dealing an extra [[/r {1d6}[positive]]]{1d6 positive damage} to undead. On a critical hit, the undead is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: Effect: Twin Parry
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status B.name: Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status Bonus - Self)
Effect: Wymblessed Blood Magic (Status B.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. You gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-level spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Effect: Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{Cut From The Air}.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Stance: Mountain Stance.name: Stance: Mountain Stance
Stance: Mountain Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance}

You enter the stance of an implacable mountain—a technique first discovered by dwarven monks—allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche. The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped. However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +0, meaning you don't add your Dexterity to your AC, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.

Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.name: Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance
Stance: Vitality-Manipulation Stance.description:
You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points like your rival Shino Hakusa. You gain a vitality blast ranged unarmed Strike that deals [[/r {1d4}[negative]]]{1d4 negative damage}, has a range of 30 feet, and has the unarmed and versatile positive traits.

Additionally, when you use Stunning Fist, instead of saving against being stunned, you can choose to have the target make a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following results. You must choose to do this before the target rolls its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's muscles become temporarily weaker. For 1 round, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and any time it attempts to take an action with the manipulate trait, the action is disrupted unless it succeeds at a flat check with a DC equal to 5 + its enfeebled value.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, the flat check is DC 11, and the target takes –10-foot status penalty to all Speeds for the duration.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}.

If the next action you use is to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Wings of Air.name: Effect: Wings of Air
Effect: Wings of Air.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you’ve manifested your wings.

Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).name: Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success)
Effect: Decry Thief (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HHw2DjTxdv1jBZd]{Decry Thief}

For 1 round, the target takes a -10 foot status penalty to Speed and a -4 status penalty to Stealth.

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Cat Nap.name: Effect: Cat Nap
Effect: Cat Nap.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zvtYsz9jk8tPvlpS]{Cat Nap}.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

Stance: Multishot Stance.name: Stance: Multishot Stance
Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{Multishot Stance}.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for Double Shot is reduced to -1, or -2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.

Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Holy Rune.description:
Holy weapons command powerful celestial energy. A weapon with this rune deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[good]]]{1d6 good damage} against evil targets. If you are evil, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command; Frequency once per day; Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against an evil creature with the weapon; Effect You regain HP equal to double the evil creature's level. This is a good, positive, healing effect.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Hunter's Edge: Outwit} with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Hunter's Edge: Precision} with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

Effect: Control Tower.name: Effect: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description: Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

Stance: Crane Stance.name: Stance: Crane Stance
Stance: Crane Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}

You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane's wings and using flowing, defensive motions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Crane Stance, reduce the DC for @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} by 5, and when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 electricity damage, or an extra 1d6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Effect: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Fleet Tempo.name: Effect: Fleet Tempo
Effect: Fleet Tempo.description: You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Defensive Instincts.name: Effect: Defensive Instincts
Effect: Defensive Instincts.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RxA1PdgGbijkieJD]{Defensive Instincts}

Requirements you are adjacent to at least two enemies

Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn and Step.

Stance: Tiger Stance.name: Stance: Tiger Stance
Stance: Tiger Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VCjAlOvjNvFJOsG5]{Tiger Stance}

You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

On a critical success with your tiger claws, if you deal damage, the target takes [[/r 1d4 #persistent bleed]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}.

As long as your Speed is at least 20 feet while in Tiger Stance, you can Step 10 feet.

Stance: Jellyfish Stance.name: Stance: Jellyfish Stance
Stance: Jellyfish Stance.description:
Requirements You are unarmored.

You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity. You can make stinging lash attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. These attacks are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, nonlethal, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in Jellyfish Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves and on checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeeze}.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect: While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal: A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special: A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Hybrid Form.name: Effect: Hybrid Form
Effect: Hybrid Form.description: In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

Stance: Dragon Stance.name: Stance: Dragon Stance
Stance: Dragon Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8sy3sHwOHS4ImwvJ]{Dragon Stance}

You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon's tail. You can make dragon tail attacks that deal 1d10 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the backswing, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Dragon Stance, you can ignore the first square of difficult terrain while Striding.

Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Unholy Rune.description:
An unholy rune instills fiendish power into the etched weapon. A weapon with this rune deals an additional [[/r {1d6}[evil]]]{1d6 evil damage} when it hits a good target. If you are good, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

Activate R command; Frequency once per day; Trigger You critically succeed at an attack roll against a good creature with the weapon; Effect The target takes [[/r 1d8 #persistent bleed]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} per weapon damage die of the etched weapon.

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).name: Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.name: Stance: Stoked Flame Stance
Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements. You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1d6 persistent fire damage.

While in Stoked Flame Stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3rd.

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed).name: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed)
Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and do not already have a climb Speed.

You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}.

Allies within 15 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}.

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Stance: Ironblood Stance.name: Stance: Ironblood Stance
Stance: Ironblood Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9cYkB8DrUBBwqJd]{Ironblood Stance}

You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow. You can make iron sweep unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, parry, sweep, and unarmed traits.

While in Ironblood Stance, you gain resistance 2 to all damage. The resistance increases to 3 at 12th level, to 4 at 16th level, and to 5 at 20th level.

@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-effects.fRlvmul3LbLo2xvR]{Effect: Parry}

Effect: Clue In (Expertise).name: Effect: Clue In (Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Expertise).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes}. These deal 1d4 negative damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Hunter's Edge: Flurry} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Effect: Witch's Charge
Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.

Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).name: Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure)
Effect: Deep Freeze (Failure).description: The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Clue In.name: Effect: Clue In
Effect: Clue In.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In}.

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Stance: Peafowl Stance.name: Stance: Peafowl Stance
Stance: Peafowl Stance.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Effect: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Stance: Mountain Stance (Mountain Quake).name: Stance: Mountain Stance (Mountain Quake)
Stance: Mountain Stance (Mountain Quake).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZL5UU9quCTvcWzfY]{Mountain Stance} if you have @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hO4sKslTrSQMLbGx]{Mountain Quake}, which increases the Dexterity modifier cap to your AC to +2.

You enter the stance of an implacable mountain—a technique first discovered by dwarven monks—allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche. The only Strikes you can make are falling stone unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the forceful, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Mountain Stance, you gain a +4 item bonus to AC and a +2 circumstance bonus to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped.

However, you have a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +2, and your Speeds are all reduced by 5 feet. The item bonus to AC from Mountain Stance is cumulative with armor potency runes on your explorer's clothing, mage armor, and bracers of armor.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 acid damage, or an extra 1d6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: Effect: Cavalier's Banner
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune.name: Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune
Effect: Blade Ally Anarchic Rune.description:
An anarchic rune is jagged and asymmetrical, channeling chaotic energy. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 chaotic damage against lawful targets. If you are lawful, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while carrying or wielding this weapon.

When you critically succeed at a Strike with this weapon against a lawful creature, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, you deal double minimum damage; on a 3 or 4, double your damage normally; on a 5 or 6, you deal double maximum damage.

Craft Requirements You are chaotic.

Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.name: Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness, Expertise)
Effect: Clue In (Detective's Readiness,.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In} if the investigator has @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5cYFHKQK6OZCwavI]{Detective's Readiness} and @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.PFvB79O2VFdiAeSj]{Investigator Expertise}.

Whenever you attempt a saving throw against the subject of a lead, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Force)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 force damage.

Effect: Assisting Shot.name: Effect: Assisting Shot
Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.
